412990.name: The Escapists - Santa's Sweatshop
412990.description:
After suffering Santa's cruel regime for the last 20 years, it's time you got back home to enjoy Christmas with your *real* family. . . Sick and tired of bad working conditions and rubbish pay, you decide to hit Santa where it hurts most and escape Santa’s Sweatshop!

Features



  • All new items and craftables to really get you in to the Christmas spirit!
  • Christmas themed level, jobs, characters and dialogue to get you through your working day!
  • Get festive – despite the fact your poor elf fingers are worked to the bone!
  • Get one up on Santa and finally break free from his shackles!
  • Fresh and festive soundtrack to soak up as you plot your escape!
  • All new achievements for you to track down as well as the possibility of topping the Leaderboard!
412990.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 意大利语
